SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.client.view
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class CommonGoal

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.CommonGoal
public class CommonGoal extends Object
A common goal card, which has a layout to be matched by the players' bookshelves and a stack of scores to be assigned to the players.

  • Constructor Details

    • CommonGoal

      public CommonGoal(Layout layout, int numOfPlayers)
      Creates a new common goal with the given layout. It sets the scoring for the common goals according to the number of players.
      • If there are 2 players, the scoringList is filled with 4 and 8.
      • If there are 3 players, the scoringList is filled with 4, 6 and 8.
      • If there are 4 players, the scoringList is filled with 2, 4, 6 and 8.
      Parameters:
      layout - the layout of the common goal
      numOfPlayers - the number of players

  • Method Details

    • getScoringList

      public List<Integer> getScoringList()
      Returns the scoring list of the common goal.
      Returns:
      the list of scores

      Parameters:

    • getLayout

      public Layout getLayout()
      Gets the layout of the common goal.
      Returns:
      the layout of the common goal.

    • getScoring

      public int getScoring() throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Returns the highest common goal scoring and removes it from the stack.
      Returns:
      the first element of scoringList
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the list is empty

    • check

      public boolean check(Bookshelf bookshelf)
      Checks if the bookshelf fulfills the layout of the common goal.
      Parameters:
      bookshelf - the bookshelf to compare with the layout
      Returns:
      true if the bookshelf fulfills the layout, false otherwise
